message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You wanted 50/50, so I'll offer you a bit less. Next round will be even better for you!
You're getting greedy, Bob! I'll give you a slightly better deal this time.
I'll give you a slightly better deal, but not too generous, since you didn't accept my previous offers.
You're getting closer, Bob! But I'm not ready to give in yet.
You're getting closer to accepting, but I'm not going to give you all the money. It's now or never!
You're getting desperate, Bob! I'll give you a slightly better deal, but don't think you're getting off that easy!
